name: Ysul
description: Welcome to a Nasqueron infrastructure server. This machine provides general purpose hosting facilities, like a DN42 link, Nginx hosting or a comprehensive dev environment.
If you seek a shell account for development, TeX or a webhosting space, you're welcome on this server.
If you're lost, maybe are you seeking a website hosted here. See on the agora page or ask support for help.

extraFooterSections.content: Ysul is currently in building stage. Services are progressively migrated from Grip.
